content: --मनस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} good-minded, of a good disposition, benevolent. {2} well-pleased, satisfied. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {1} a god, divinity. {2} a learned man. {3} a student of the Vedas. {4} wheat. {5} the Nimba tree. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} , {%<ab>n.</ab>%}; said to be <ab>pl.</ab> only by some a flower; रमणीय एष वः सुमनसां संनिवेशः <ls>Māl. 1</ls> (where the adjectival sense in 1 is also intended); किं सेव्यते सुमनसां मनसापि गंधः कस्तूरिकाजननशक्तिभृता मृगेण <ls>R. G.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 66.</ls> {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} the great-flowered jasmine. {2} the Mālatī creeper.
